name: Sophia Blake
bio: Sophia Blake has over 12 years of experience specializing in modern haircuts and color techniques. She loves transforming looks to bring out each client's unique style.

name: Isabella Moore
bio: Isabella Moore is a professional makeup artist with 8 years of experience. She is passionate about bridal makeup and high-fashion editorial looks.

name: Chloe Bennett
bio: Chloe has been beautifying nails for 10 years with a focus on creativity and hygiene. She specializes in nail art and gel manicures.

name: Mia Carter
bio: Mia is an expert barber known for precision cuts and classic styles. He enjoys working with clients to achieve the perfect look.

name: Olivia Brooks
bio: Olivia has 7 years of experience in skincare treatments, helping clients achieve healthy and radiant skin with personalized routines.

name: Ava Reynolds
bio: Ava is a licensed massage therapist with expertise in relaxation and therapeutic massages aimed at stress relief and muscle recovery.
